about_the_game:
Indulge in a nostalgic journey down memory lane with this captivating jigsaw puzzle game centered around childhood dreams. Piece together enchanting scenes that bring to life the cherished dreams and whimsical fantasies of our youth.

Step into a world of imagination and wonder as you assemble puzzles featuring dreamlike landscapes, magical creatures, and iconic symbols of childhood dreams. Each puzzle captures the essence of those whimsical dreams we held dear.

Immerse yourself in the joy of solving puzzles as you carefully fit together the interlocking pieces, revealing scenes that ignite a sense of nostalgia and warmth. With varying difficulty levels, you can choose puzzles that cater to your expertise, making it an enjoyable experience for puzzle enthusiasts of all ages.

As you progress through the game, unlock new puzzles that delve deeper into the realm of childhood dreams. Explore different dreamscapes, from mystical forests to space odysseys, and relive the magic and innocence of your cherished aspirations.

Whether you're a puzzle aficionado or simply seeking a delightful pastime, this jigsaw puzzle game offers a heartwarming escape into the world of childhood dreams. Experience the therapeutic and gratifying process of piecing together these dream-inspired images, rekindling the sense of wonder and limitless possibilities that defined our early years.

Featuring captivating artwork, intuitive controls, and a nostalgic soundtrack, this jigsaw puzzle game creates a whimsical and immersive experience that celebrates the power of imagination. Get ready to embark on a puzzle-solving adventure that ignites your childhood dreams and stirs your inner child's imagination once more.

Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

- 3 difficulty settings: Up to 42 pieces!
- 16 puzzles
- Every puzzle is unique: Different piece shapes every time!
- 1080p HD Graphics.
- Traditional jigsaw puzzle that you can easily play
- More puzzles will increase with DLC
